metadata.title: CVE-2021-47176 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  s390/dasd: add missing discipline function  Fix crash with illegal operation exception in dasd_device_tasklet. Commit b72949328869 ("s390/dasd: Prepare for additional path event handling") renamed the verify_path function for ECKD but not for FBA and DIAG. This leads to a panic when the path verification function is called for a FBA or DIAG device.  Fix by defining a wrapper function for dasd_generic_verify_path().
